name: Rapture (itch)
description:
This is a game created as an interactive music video for the song 'Rapture'.  The original game was written by Shambles Miller and was ported to Unity by Gusbo MacDonald.

Buy/download music from Shambles Miller, including 'Rapture' at http://shamblesmiller.bandcamp.com or buy him a coffee at Ko-fi.com/shamblesmiller
